edu.buffalo.memlib

Class SwapManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.buffalo.memlib.SwapManager

  • final class SwapManager
extends Object
    Application-wide daemon thread. Periodically monitors heap utilization and swaps objects as necessary.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static Thread daemon
      Start this thread to start monitoring.
      private static boolean initialized
      Set to true when daemon thread has started.
      private static Policy policy 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private SwapManager() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static void analyze()
      Analyze memory usage and swap if necessary.
      static void force()
      Force early heap analysis.
      static void initialize()
      Initialize the swap manager thread.
      private static void monitor()
      The monitoring code.
      static void setPolicy(Policy policy)
      Set the global policy used by the swap manager.
      private static void swapUntil(double target)
      Swap until target utilization is reached (or there is nothing to swap).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • initialized

        Set to true when daemon thread has started.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SwapManager

    • Method Detail

      • setPolicy

        public static void setPolicy(Policy policy)
        Set the global policy used by the swap manager.

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()
        Initialize the swap manager thread. No effect if already started.

      • monitor

        private static void monitor()
        The monitoring code. Will be run in a separate thread.

      • force

        public static void force()
        Force early heap analysis.

      • analyze

        private static void analyze()
        Analyze memory usage and swap if necessary.

      • swapUntil

        private static void swapUntil(double target)
        Swap until target utilization is reached (or there is nothing to swap).
